parameters.name: GroupUuid
parameters.description:
The ID of the address book.

To delete the address book, you must provide the ID of the address book. You can call the DescribeAddressBook operation to query the ID.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The natural language of the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese (default)
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.
